alert.note: Alert for Brown; Nemaha (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 16 at 3:02PM CDT until September 16 at 3:30PM CDT by NWS Topeka
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 330 PM CDT FOR NORTHEASTERN NEMAHA AND NORTHWESTERN BROWN COUNTIES... At 300 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 2 miles north Sabetha, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Sabetha, Fairview, Morrill, Reserve and Hamlin. At 250 PM...Trained spotters reported golfball size hail 5 miles east-northeast of Bern. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.
